element.name: First EMS Unit on Scene
element.definition: Documentation that this EMS unit was the first EMS unit for the EMS Agency on the scene
element.v3Comment: Added to improve the evaluation of Response Times when multiple EMS units are responding to the same scene.

asserts.assert: When First EMS Unit on Scene has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When First EMS Unit on Scene is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
